compliant.section: Service Provider means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used.
compliant.legal provisions: This section aligns with GDPR's definition of 'processor' and the requirements for data processing agreements.

non_compliant.legal provisions: GDPR requires a more specific definition of 'Service' to clearly outline the scope of data processing activities.
non_compliant.amend: Provide a clear and comprehensive definition of what the 'Service' entails, including the specific processing activities involved.

non_compliant.section: Third-party Social Media Service refers to any website or any social network website through which a User can log in or create an account to use the Service.
non_compliant.legal provisions: While this section defines 'Third-party Social Media Service,' it lacks transparency regarding the specific data processing involved when users interact with these services.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the purposes of data processing related to Third-party Social Media Services and ensure lawful basis for such processing, such as explicit consent.
